update.foreach: insert into buss_process_goal (user_id,team_id,customer_category_id,goal_month,cover_s, cover_t,cover_y,cover_c,visit_s,visit_t, visit_y,visit_c,deal_s,deal_t,deal_y, deal_c,active_s,active_t,active_y,active_c, created_at,updated_at) values (#{item.user_id},#{item.team_id},#{item.customer_category_id},#{item.goal_month},#{item.cover_s}, #{item.cover_t},#{item.cover_y},#{item.cover_c},#{item.visit_s},#{item.visit_t}, #{item.visit_y},#{item.visit_c},#{item.deal_s},#{item.deal_t},#{item.deal_y}, #{item.deal_c},#{item.active_s},#{item.active_t},#{item.active_y},#{item.active_c}, #{item.created_at},#{item.updated_at}) on duplicate key update cover_s = #{item.cover_s}, cover_t = #{item.cover_t}, cover_y = #{item.cover_y}, cover_c = #{item.cover_c}, visit_s = #{item.visit_s},visit_t = #{item.visit_t},visit_y = #{item.visit_y},visit_c = #{item.visit_c}, deal_s = #{item.deal_s}, deal_t = #{item.deal_t},deal_y = #{item.deal_y}, deal_c = #{item.deal_c}, active_s = #{item.active_s}, active_t = #{item.active_t}, active_y = #{item.active_y},active_c = #{item.active_c},updated_at = #{item.updated_at}
